title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: HS20001/HS20005 Course ContentsRational of Regulation; Theories of Economic Regulation; Issues under Regulation; Revolution of Deregulation; Cost-of-service Regulation, Incentive Regulation, Pricing Methodologies, Equity, and Incentive; Regulation of Risks with Special Emphasis on Indian Stock Market and Insurance Sector; Regulation of Infrastructure: Experience from Telecommunication, Airline and Electricity Sector of India; Anti-trust and Competition Policy
